location.name: Tiberius
location.description: You are in the city of Tiberius. You see a long street with high buildings and a castle.You see an exit to the south.

location.name: Desert
location.description: You are in hot dreary desert, surrounded by sand dunes and nothingness, you see an exit to the south.

location.name: Jerusalem
location.description: You are at battlefield of Jerusalem. You are in awe of your surroundings, you see an exit to the west.

location.name: Horns of Hattin
location.description: You are at battlefield of Hattin. You see the ruination of the battle and fallen comrades...You see an exit to the north.

location.name: Damascus
location.description: You are in Damascus. You see the some shady characters...you see an exit to the west.

location.name: Tripoli
location.description: You are in Tripoli. You see the some more shady characters...you see an exit to the north.

location.name: Antioch
location.description: You are in the city of Antioch. You see a long street with high buildings and a castle.. You see the some more shady characters...you see an exit to the north.

location.name: Sis
location.description: You are in the city of Sis....exit ahead in the west.

location.name: Tarsus
location.description: You are in the city of Tarsus. ...you see an exit to the south.

location.name: Cyprus
location.description: You are in the Cyprus, the Byzantine Empire, your quest is over finally!. ...
